pkgmetadata.longdescription: Plot ForestGEO Data // To help you access, transform, analyze, and visualize ForestGEO data, we developed a collection of R packages (https://forestgeo.github.io/fgeo/). This package, in particular, helps you to plot ForestGEO data. To learn more about ForestGEO visit http://www.forestgeo.si.edu/.
